Package backEnd

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
backEnd.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
Ship is the vehicle to travel from an island to the other
There are 4 ships for player to choose from
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinner-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(java.lang.String name, int crew, int capacity, int attack, int damage, int speed, java.lang.String imgString)
      Constructor of a ship
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ship
      crew - The number of crew on the ship
      capacity - The maximum capacity that the ship can hold
      attack - The attack multiplier of the ship
      damage - The damage multiplier of the ship
      speed - The speed of the ship
      imgString - The location of the ships image
